mapper.select: SELECT g.city name,g.city `value` FROM (select count(distinct p.serial_number) counts ,city FROM project_financing_log pfl left join projects p on pfl.project_id = p.id WHERE p.continent != '国外' and pfl.financing_time >= '2017-01-01' and city is not NULL and city != "" GROUP BY city ) g ORDER BY counts DESC limit 0,11

select fe.education_experience name, fe.education_experience `value`, count(distinct mf.serial_number) count from project_financing_log pfl LEFT JOIN projects mf on pfl.project_id = mf.id
LEFT JOIN founders f on mf.id = f.project_id
right join founders_education fe on fe.founder_id = f.id and fe.education_experience != '' where pfl.financing_time > '2017-01-01' group by fe.education_experience order by count desc limit 11

select fw.work_experience name,fw.work_experience `value` , count(distinct mf.serial_number) count from project_financing_log pfl LEFT JOIN projects mf on pfl.project_id = mf.id left join investment_institutions ii on mf.`investment_institutions_id` = ii.id LEFT JOIN founders f on mf.id = f.project_id
right join founders_work fw on fw.founder_id = f.id where pfl.financing_time > '2017-01-01' group by fw.work_experience order by count desc limit 11

select ps.segmentation_name name,ps.segmentation_name `value` , count(distinct mf.serial_number) count from project_financing_log pfl LEFT JOIN projects mf on pfl.project_id = mf.id right join project_segmentation ps on ps.project_id = mf.id
where pfl.financing_time > '2017-01-01' group by ps.segmentation_name order by count desc
